A

accountExists(String) - Method in class src.Accounts
Method checks if an account exists in the account data file.
Accounts - Class in src
This class is used to store all relevant information related to accounts.

Accounts data is stored in the accountsdata.json file.

Account registration and login are handled by the Accounts.registerAccount(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) and Accounts.login(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) methods respectively.

A variety of getter and setter methods are also provided to obtain and modify account information.
Accounts() - Constructor for class src.Accounts
Constructor will either create a new accounts file or read in an existing one.

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class src.PauseMenu
